{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2800 |revision=VG |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=03/16/2005 |fcc_id=JCK-GN-WIAG02 |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C2510A;S3C2510A01; |cpu2_brand=Conexant |cpu2_model=CX82310 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320B-70TCP |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=Gigabyte GN-WIAG02 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2414 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=AccessRunner Single Chip ADSL Router;Conexant;CX82310;;1;,,, VoIP Chipset;VoicePump;VP101;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui=00:14:85 |oui_eth=00:50:7F }}
"P/N:406-280000-40" and "Made in Taiwan" is silkscreened on the board. :CPU: [[Samsung]] S3C2510A01
GN-WIAG02 wireless module (the FCC ID of this device has been assigned to this entry)
